page.shortlink: api objects session object get data from file method
page.description: Gets the contents of a file previously stored in the current session and identified by the key value.

prototypes.prototype: Context.Session.GetDataFromFile as L (Key as C, ByRef Value as B, Remove as L = .F.)
Context.Session.GetDataFromFile as L (ByRef Value as B, Key as C, Remove as L = .F.)

argument.name: Key
argument.description: The key of the session file to be retrieved.

argument.name: Value
argument.description: A reference to a blob variable to receive the contents of the session file.

argument.name: Remove
argument.description: A setting of .T. or .F. to remove the item from session storage after it has been retrieved. This is optional and defaults to .F..

page.discussion: Context.Session.GetDataFromFile() gets the contents of a file previously stored in the current session and identified by the key value. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
